TimEat is the service that provides an opportunity for the users to order food in advance (before coming to the restaurant) with 100% prepayment.

features

  • The highest level of service
  • Increase the clients flow
  • Accelerate clients flow
  • The opportunity to have lunch during busy day
  • Eliminate the waiting time for users
  • Increase customer loyalty

how it works?

roadmap

Launch TIMEAT in Kyiv, expand team developing and our partnership with Poster company

Reach or nearest goals: 50 restaurants and 500 montly active users, start spreding on other cities

Second round of investment

Become nationwide company, continue spreading on largest Ukrainian cities

launch on European market

our team

Vladimir Metnew

Co-founder

Full stack developer and open-source contributor. Worked as Lead developer at StreamSpread (live video advertising startup, featured on TwitchCon 2017), Lead developer at PoptopUK (event planning startup).
